title: Network Magic Pro v.5.1.8354.0 [Multi-Language][Patch]
description:
Network Magic Pro 5.1

Having trouble connecting your devices together and to the Internet or printing from any computer?

With Network Magic Pro 5.1, you can skip the tech support phone calls, online forums and expensive on-site consultants. Network Magic Pro provides do-it-yourself tools to help you set up, manage and secure your network like an IT professional.
With point-and-click ease, you can:


Centralized network management interface

New interface and start-up wizards help guide you through getting connected and managing your network



Network Map

See all of your computers and devices in a dynamic visual map, plus view and be able to print device details. Be immediately notified by device specific alerts to help you solve network problems!




Status Center

Get alerts and status notifications to help you keep your network safe and healthy



Share files and printers

Select "share" and be able to access music, photos, and other documents from any computer on your network


Protect your network

Protect your important documents and information from intruders with WPA encryption and intruder alerts <a href="
http://www1.purenetworks.com/images/screenshots/tour/pro/Wireless_Protection_Pro.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www1.purenetworks.com/images/screenshots/tour/pro/Wireless_Protection_Pro.jpg</a>


Networking tools

Tools to help you easily fix networking basics



Control Internet access

Control what times each computer on your network is able to access the Internet <a href="
http://www1.purenetworks.com/images/screenshots/tour/pro/Blocked_Internet.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www1.purenetworks.com/images/screenshots/tour/pro/Blocked_Internet.jpg</a>


Monitor computer and online activity

See what your kids or others on your network are doing online



* Connect your devices together in minutes
* Share Internet connections, printers and files
* Protect your network with enhanced WPA security capabilities and status alerts
* Repair your network and Internet connections to stay online and productive
* Control access to the Internet and track online activity with remote desktop screenshots



Copy Patch.exe into C:Program FilesPure NetworksNetwork Magic
Run C:Program FilesPure NetworksNetwork MagicPatch.exe
and click on the PATCH button.
Start the Pure Networks Platform Service and then start Network Magic.
It works very well
